description:
With its midweight insulation and unmatched breathability, the Union Suit is the key to shoulder season perfection. Pair with a drysuit to keep you comfortable and protected from the elements.

  • Recycled Eco Blend™ fabric is moisture wicking, quick drying and as soft as it gets
  • Fabric has built stretch for full range of movement
  • Soft, gridded interior delivers cozy comfort
  • YKK® front-entry zipper and dropseat for convenience
  • Stirrups keep legs from riding up and allows easy layering under a drysuit
  • UPF 50+ protection
name: NRS Lightweight Union Suit - Women's
